tool_description: Coin Price List is a service for obtaining historical, statistical data on crypto pairs. Exchange crypto pairs.
name: Coin Price List Api
title: Coin Price List Api

api_list.name: Historical data
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the exchange rate history for the selected pair

required_parameters.name: interval
required_parameters.description: This parameter contains the interval with which you want to return the exchange rate history for the selected pair. Available values : hourly, daily, weekly, monthly.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: This parameter contains a crypto pair, the list of which can be obtained in the server response via the GET /api​/exchanges​/pairs endpoint

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: This parameter contains the date and time from which the course history should be returned.  Example: 2022-05-31T02:45:26.799Z

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: This parameter contains the date and time from which the course history should be returned.  Example: 2022-05-31T02:45:26.799Z

api_list.name: Convert cryptocurrency
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to convert cryptocurrency to cryptocurrency, fiat currency to cryptocurrency, cryptocurrency to fiat currency, and fiat currency to fiat currency.

api_list.name: Get crypto pairs on the selected exchange
api_list.description: Getting cryptocurrency pairs on the selected exchange

api_list.name: Get available exchanges
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get a list of all available exchanges, the Ids of which should be used in other requests.
